title: Rotation Champs in ranked
body: Did they change it so you can now play free rotation champs in ranked? Was playing ranked solo/duo and thought I had accidently qued normal draft cause it gave me access to free champs I didn't own. Locked in Ekko, won the game. And then afterwards my LP went up. Checked the patch notes and there doesn't seem to be a mention of this. So is this a bug or a feature?
